SELECT `obj`.`Id`, `obj`.`DepartmentId`, `obj`.`Description`, `obj`.`Name`, `obj.Department`.`Id`, `obj.Department`.`Name`
FROM `Category` AS `obj`
INNER JOIN `Department` AS `obj.Department` ON `obj`.`DepartmentId` = `obj.Department`.`Id`

WHERE `userRole`.`UserId` = @__userId_0

SELECT `x`.`Id`, `x`.`Amount`, `x`.`CustomerName`, `x`.`Date`, `x`.`SellerId`, `x`.`Status`, `x.Seller`.`Id`, `x.Seller`.`BaseSalary`, `x.Seller`.`Birthdate`, `x.Seller`.`DepartmentId`, `x.Seller`.`Email`, `x.Seller`.`Name`, `x.Seller`.`Phone`, `x.Seller.Department`.`Id`, `x.Seller.Department`.`Name`
FROM `SalesRecord` AS `x`
INNER JOIN `Seller` AS `x.Seller` ON `x`.`SellerId` = `x.Seller`.`Id`
INNER JOIN `Department` AS `x.Seller.Department` ON `x.Seller`.`DepartmentId` = `x.Seller.Department`.`Id`
ORDER BY `x`.`Date` DESC
2023-12-20 21:10:55.031 -03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (9ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT `x`.`Id`, `x`.`Amount`, `x`.`CustomerName`, `x`.`Date`, `x`.`SellerId`, `x`.`Status`, `x.Seller`.`Id`, `x.Seller`.`BaseSalary`, `x.Seller`.`Birthdate`, `x.Seller`.`DepartmentId`, `x.Seller`.`Email`, `x.Seller`.`Name`, `x.Seller`.`Phone`, `x.Seller.Department`.`Id`, `x.Seller.Department`.`Name`
FROM `SalesRecord` AS `x`
INNER JOIN `Seller` AS `x.Seller` ON `x`.`SellerId` = `x.Seller`.`Id`
INNER JOIN `Department` AS `x.Seller.Department` ON `x.Seller`.`DepartmentId` = `x.Seller.Department`.`Id`
ORDER BY `x`.`Date` DESC

SELECT `x`.`Id`, `x`.`CategoryId`, `x`.`DepartmentId`, `x`.`Description`, `x`.`ImageUrl`, `x`.`Name`, `x`.`Price`, `x`.`SalesRecordId`, `x.Department`.`Id`, `x.Department`.`Name`, `x.Category`.`Id`, `x.Category`.`DepartmentId`, `x.Category`.`Description`, `x.Category`.`Name`
FROM `Product` AS `x`
INNER JOIN `Department` AS `x.Department` ON `x`.`DepartmentId` = `x.Department`.`Id`
